text: Violette Nozière is a 1978 French Canadian crime drama movie directed by Claude Chabrol and starring Isabelle Huppert, Jean Carmet, Stéphane Audran, Jean-François Garreaud, Zoe Chauveau, Bernadette Lafont. It was distributed by Koch-Lorber Films. ==Other websites== * * Category:1978 crime drama movies Category:French crime movies Category:French drama movies Category:Canadian crime movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Claude Chabrol
title: Violette Nozière
